## Pull Request Description

Please provide a clear and concise description of your changes.

## Type of Change

Please check the relevant option(s):

- [ ] Documentation update (non-breaking change which updates documentation)
- [ ] Translation (adding or improving translations)
- [ ] Specification enhancement (adding or refining requirements)
- [ ] Example addition (new use case or implementation example)
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Governance or process change

## Trilingual Requirement

For documentation changes, confirm all three languages are included:

- [ ] English (EN) - included/updated
- [ ] German (DE) - included/updated
- [ ] Arabic (AR) - included/updated
- [ ] N/A (not a documentation change)

## SAGE Alignment

Please confirm this change aligns with SAGE principles:

- [ ] Supports Safe Simplicity
- [ ] Enhances Assisted Autonomy
- [ ] Improves Guided Interaction
- [ ] Strengthens Emotional Trust Layer
- [ ] N/A (governance/process change)

## Checklist

Before submitting, please ensure:

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] My changes follow the project's coding/documentation standards
- [ ] I have used consistent terminology from the glossary
- [ ] I have added/updated examples where appropriate
- [ ] I have updated relevant checklists if adding requirements
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have checked for spelling and grammar errors
- [ ] For specifications: Requirements are testable and auditable
